overview_of_class: This course builds on the fundamentals developed in Chemistry 212-1 and 212-2. It will include pericyclic reactions, functional group participation, rearrangements, fragmentations, radical reactions, synthesis and reactions of carbenes and nitrenes, the synthesis and chemistry of synthetic polymers, and the bioorganic chemistry of carbohydrates, nucleosides, nucleotides, nucleic acids, amino acids, peptides, and lipids.
name: Organic Chemistry
subject: CHEM
